formalpara.title: New Sword setup dialog
formalpara.para: Since version 1.4 BibleTime offers a new dialog to manage Sword modules. It is now possible to setup Sword's configuration, install modules and uninstall modules using a userfriendly interface. Large screenshot

formalpara.title: Improvements in 1.3
formalpara.para: Here you can see some improvements of BibleTime 1.3. The tree on the left is now set up by module type and language. The greek text in the right display window is now displayed better because BibleTime supports now own font settings for each language. Large screenshot

formalpara.title: New search dialog
formalpara.para: The search dialog of previous versions wasn't easy to use. This is the new search dialog together with the new module chooser window on the right. Large screenshot
